actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 202 of the Interstate Commerce Act to prohibit certain motor carrier operations between the United States and any contiguous foreign country by a person not a citizen of the United States unless the foreign country concerned grants reciprocal privileges to citizens of the United States.

summary.text: Prohibits motor carrier operations between the United States and any contiguous foreign country by a person not a citizen of the United States unless the foreign country concerned grants reciprocal privileges to citizens of the United States. (Adds 49 U.S.C. 302(d))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 202 of the Interstate Commerce Act to prohibit certain motor carrier operations between the United States and any contiguous foreign country by a person not a citizen of the United States unless the foreign country concerned grants reciprocal privileges to citizens of the United States.
